summary: King Asa leads Judah in religious reforms, removing idols and encouraging the people to seek the Lord. When attacked by a vast Cushite army, Asa calls on God and experiences a miraculous victory.

faq.question: What reforms did Asa make?
faq.answer: He removed idols and commanded the people to seek the Lord.

faq.question: How did Judah win against the Cushites?
faq.answer: Asa prayed, and God gave them supernatural victory.
